name: plushlab
description: A full-stack progressive web app that caters to bike mechanics and those who service their own mountain bikes.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Brahm Van Houzen
